name: LizardPope
description:
You are the pope, a lizard in disguise. The US Military revealed your secret identity and now wants to destroy you. Can you defeat them?

Made by Andreas Hässler, Philipp Ploder and Raphael Herdlicka during the LudumDare 35 contest.

Controls
WASD for movement
Q to throw a cross
E to summon a lightning bolt (hold to move)
Shift to dash forwards whilst moving

System Requirements
The game will run on almost any computer.
